name: 阿什顿·罗伯森
name_full: 阿什顿·罗伯森 Ashton Robertson
introduction: Ashton lives in the United Kingdom.Credits include 'Nigel' in Roald Dahl's Matilda the Musical for Netflix and 'Bruce' in Matilda the Musical, Cambridge Theatre, London.In 2023-2024, he is playing "Bruce" on the "Matilda" tour in China.He is so excited to be continuing his Matilda journey around the world!阿什顿生活在英国。他曾在奈飞出品的《玛蒂尔达》电影中扮演“奈杰尔”，也曾在伦敦剑桥剧院的《玛蒂尔达》音乐剧中扮演“布鲁斯”。2023年至2024年,他正在中国《玛蒂尔达》巡演中饰演"布鲁斯"。能够继续在世界各地参与玛蒂尔达的演出之旅，他非常高兴！
